text: DZDP-TV, channel 28, is a commercial television station of Philippine television network GTV. It is owned by Citynet Network Marketing and Productions, a subsidiary of GMA Network Inc. This was formerly affiliated to Q and GMA News TV. Its transmitters are located at GMA Broadcast Complex, Barangay Concepción Pequeña Naga, Camarines Sur. ==Digital television== DZDP- TV's feed is broadcast on DWAI-TV digital subchannel operates on UHF channel 38 (617.143 MHz) and broadcasts on the following subchannels: Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Note 07.01 480i 4:3 GMA GMA Bicol (Main DWAI-TV programming) Commercial broadcast (10 kW) 07.02 GTV GTV Bicol (Main DZDP-TV programming) 07.03 HEART OF ASIA Heart of Asia Channel 07.06 HALLYPOP Hallypop 07.07 I HEART MOVIES I Heart Movies 07.35 240p GMA1SEG GMA Bicol 1seg broadcast ==Related pages== *GTV *DWAI-TV *Barangay FM 101.5 Naga *List of GTV stations Category:Filipino television stations Category:1992 establishments in Asia
title: DZDP-TV
